languages.text: "Или — все проще. Эти люди не лгут, и их планету правда захватили еретики, а прочее они додумали сами. Я чувствую тьму в их прошлом. Может, в замыслах всяких Кунрадов я не разбираюсь, но в таких вопросах — да".

"Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."
languages.original_text: "Или — все проще. Эти люди не лгут, и их планету правда захватили еретики, а прочее они додумали сами. Я чувствую тьму в их прошлом. Может, в замыслах всяких Кунрадов я не разбираюсь, но в таких вопросах — да".

traits.locale_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet did get taken by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but I am one when it comes to such things."

"Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet did get taken by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but I am one when it comes to such things."

"Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but I when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

"Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but I when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

"Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

languages.text: 「それか、もっと単純な理由かもしれないわ。彼らは真実を言っていて、その惑星は異端者に占拠されたけど、残りはほら話かもしれない。彼らの過去から闇を感じるわ。あたいはクンラッドや彼らの策略について詳しいわけではないけど、こういうことに関しては熟知しているの」
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: 「それか、もっと単純な理由かもしれないわ。彼らは真実を言っていて、その惑星は異端者に占拠されたけど、残りはほら話かもしれない。彼らの過去から闇を感じるわ。あたいはクンラッドや彼らの策略について詳しいわけではないけど、こういうことに関しては熟知しているの」

languages.text: “可能是这样，也可能更简单——这些人并没有撒谎。他们的行星被异端占领了，剩下的都是他们自己编出来的。我能感觉到他们过去之中隐藏的黑暗。或许我并不是阴谋方面的专家，也并不了解像昆拉德这种人，但涉及到这种事情的时候，我很清楚我自己在说什么。”
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: “可能是这样，也可能更简单——这些人并没有撒谎。他们的行星被异端占领了，剩下的都是他们自己编出来的。我能感觉到他们过去之中隐藏的黑暗。或许我并不是阴谋方面的专家，也并不了解像昆拉德这种人，但涉及到这种事情的时候，我很清楚我自己在说什么。”

languages.text: «Es eso o algo mucho más sencillo: que es verdad que su planeta fue tomado por los herejes, pero que lo demás se lo han inventado. Percibo un pasado oscuro; puede que no sea experta en los Kunrad y sus argucias, pero cuando se trata de cosas así... sé de lo que hablo».
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: «Es eso o algo mucho más sencillo: que es verdad que su planeta fue tomado por los herejes, pero que lo demás se lo han inventado. Percibo un pasado oscuro; puede que no sea experta en los Kunrad y sus argucias, pero cuando se trata de cosas así... sé de lo que hablo».

languages.text: « Ou alors, c'est encore plus simple : la planète de ces gens a vraiment été capturée par des hérétiques comme ils le prétendent et ils ont inventé le reste. Je sens beaucoup d'ombres dans leur passé. Je ne suis peut-être pas une experte concernant Kunrad et ses machinations, mais pour ce genre de choses, je sais de quoi je parle. »
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: « Ou alors, c'est encore plus simple : la planète de ces gens a vraiment été capturée par des hérétiques comme ils le prétendent et ils ont inventé le reste. Je sens beaucoup d'ombres dans leur passé. Je ne suis peut-être pas une experte concernant Kunrad et ses machinations, mais pour ce genre de choses, je sais de quoi je parle. »

languages.text: "Entweder das oder es ist viel simpler – diese Leute lügen nicht, und ihr Planet wurde wirklich von Ketzern erobern, nur den Rest haben sie sich ausgedacht. Ich sehe da nämlich Dunkelheit in ihrer Vergangenheit. Mit den Kunrads der Welt und ihren Plänen kenne ich mich nicht aus, aber wenn es um so was hier geht – da weiß ich, wovon ich rede."
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: "Entweder das oder es ist viel simpler – diese Leute lügen nicht, und ihr Planet wurde wirklich von Ketzern erobern, nur den Rest haben sie sich ausgedacht. Ich sehe da nämlich Dunkelheit in ihrer Vergangenheit. Mit den Kunrads der Welt und ihren Plänen kenne ich mich nicht aus, aber wenn es um so was hier geht – da weiß ich, wovon ich rede."

languages.text: "Ya öyle ya da izahati çok daha basit: Bu insanlar yalan söylemiyor ve gezegenlerini sahiden de kâfirler ele geçirdi. Gerisini de kendileri uydurdular. Geçmişlerindeki karanlığı sezebiliyorum. Kunrad ve dümenleri konusunda uzman sayılmam belki ama iş bu konuya geldiğinde de boş konuşmam."
languages.original_text: "Either that or it's much simpler — these people aren't lying and their planet was captured by heretics, and the rest of it they made up themselves. I can sense darkness in their past. I may not be an expert on Kunrads and their schemes, but when it comes to things like this — I know what I'm talking about."

traits.locale_text: "Ya öyle, ya da durum çok daha basit: Bu insanlar yalan söylemiyor ve gezegenleri gerçekten de kâfirlerce ele geçirildi, gerisini de kendileri uydurdular. Geçmişlerindeki karanlığı hissedebiliyorum. Kumrad ve dümenleri hakkında bir uzman olmayabilirim ama bu tip konularda boş konuşmam."
